title: It's a trap: The "refugees" are jihadis !!
content: The horible truth is coming out – all those young male “migrants” are moslem foot soldiers — this is a literal invasion! This moslem creep is on TV telling the PM of Finnland that he is just a sad 17 year old ‘refugee’ boy: But the reality is much different – he is actually 20 years old and a soldier: They are sending all these fake migrants into Europe as a literally “trojan horse” invasion force !! That means they are waiting until the right moment and then they will all go on the attack. These men are jihadis – read what he says: “I have deticated my life for allah my god and hes the first n the last” Source: http://mvlehti.net/2015/09/06/ This is what the dictator General Franco did to capture Spain, he imported Morrocans soldiers to kill and rape his own people. The media is silent about what is really going on. This will probably lead to Revelation chapter 6 White Horse Rider to defeat them — it is a fulfillment of Bible prophesy as explained in my post Europe’s Hero. This first antichrist is also called the  “Great Catholic Monarch” by the Catholic mystics/prophets:
